com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.security.auth

Class AuthToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.security.auth.AuthToken

  • public class AuthToken
extends java.lang.Object
    AuthToken is used to authorize with beacons with firmwares 4.0 or higher and beacons pro.
    This authorization is required before conducting some of the operations.

    AuthToken can be obtained in 2 ways. Using Kontakt Cloud (recommended!) and offline - by providing device's password. The latter is not recommended as it may desynchronize beacon with the cloud and should only be used if one knows what he is doing.

      static interface  AuthToken.AuthTokenCallback
      Used to provide AuthToken when requesting from Kontakt Cloud.

    • Method Detail

      • obtain

        public static void obtain(java.lang.String uniqueId,
                          AuthToken.AuthTokenCallback callback)
        Used to obtain AuthToken by requesting it from Kontakt Cloud.
        This is recommended and safe way of obtaining AuthTokens.

        This method creates KontaktCloud instance implicitly. If you already have an instance you can use obtain(String, KontaktCloud, AuthTokenCallback) method.
        Parameters:
        uniqueId - Beacon's unique id
        callback - AuthToken.AuthTokenCallback instance.

      • obtain

        public static void obtain(java.lang.String uniqueId,
                          KontaktCloud kontaktCloud,
                          AuthToken.AuthTokenCallback callback)
        Used to obtain AuthToken by requesting it from Kontakt Cloud.
        This is recommended and safe way of obtaining AuthTokens.
        Parameters:
        uniqueId - Beacon's unique id
        callback - AuthToken.AuthTokenCallback instance.

      • obtain

        public static AuthToken obtain(java.lang.String password)
        Used to obtain AuthToken by providing beacon's password.
        WARNING! This should only be used in special cases as offline authorization may desynchronize the beacon with Kontakt Cloud. Always obtain AuthToken by communicating with KontaktCloud when possible.
        Parameters:
        password - Beacon's password
        Returns:
        AuthToken object
